column4: so. someone told me to make a startup to do "compiz --replace" to fix this other problem and it didn't   How can I make it so I don't have to open compiz-fusion-icon and reload my window manager every login?  I have a problem with my second monitor windows not having titlebars
sudo nano /etc/X11/default-display-manager   you will see /usr/bin/kdm change it to /usr/bin/gdm save the file and reboot
you got me now. that should just work. tmg right sometimes I forget :)
